title: cafter
author: cafter
content: why this written in red that " This user is a suspected spammer! " but when checking there profile nothings seems like a spammer, and there trust value is also not red, and some have positive trust and 0 negative trust is that a error in forum or anything in settings or error in my device?

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: No. AI is playing a vital role and with the algorithm theymos set, AI is helping detecting spammer. There are a lot of spammer around. It's great that AI is detecting them and saving the forum.I think this is a plan from satoshi nakamoto. He told theymos to remove the spammer from the forum urgently. theymos can't check everyones profile so he took this approach. AI will help him detecting all the spammer.Well, this is injustice. I'm also a spammer. I don't know how will I save my account now. Shit. fuck theymos.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Finally, Bitcointalk Anti-Spam GPT in testing phase.Less work for mods, yey

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Well, wow just wow, most of you users are all are spammers no doubt about that. Theymos made this for user detecting spammers, he should implement this years ago.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: UserU on April 01, 2023, 06:15:53 AMFinally, Bitcointalk Anti-Spam GPT in testing phase.Less work for mods, yeyyou also in red, can you tell if i am also? many good people are also marked like that, by seeing their posts they not seems like spammer, i think frequent post cause this error , Fuc* this captcha is very frustrating, collected 5 of 6 coins two times.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: What i just noticed from this is to limit people from posting quickly as they do, but i don't  think they are spammer anyone who can be able to excise patient will surely pass the CAPTCHA verification before posting.Maybe i can just assumed as @Charles-Tim said to be an April fool day.This is very stressful pass this process i think there should be an adjustment or rather still mathematical questions will be more better, something like 1+1 or 1-3 imo.  I just managed to pass the game and it's very annoying
